verses.verse: But <WG1161> I determined <WG2919> <WG5656> this <WG5124> with myself <WG1683>, that I would <WG2064> not <WG3361> come <WG2064> <WG5629> again <WG3825> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> heaviness <WG3077>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> I <WG1473> make <WG3076> you <WG5209> sorry <WG3076> <WG5719>, who <WG5101> is he <WG2076> <WG5748> then <WG2532> that maketh <WG2165> me <WG3165> glad <WG2165> <WG5723>, but <WG1508> the same which is made sorry <WG3076> <WG5746> by <WG1537> me <WG1700>?

And <WG2532> I wrote <WG1125> <WG5656> this <WG5124> same <WG846> unto you <WG5213>, lest <WG3363>, when I came <WG2064> <WG5631>, I should have <WG2192> <WG5725> sorrow <WG3077> from <WG575> them of whom <WG3739> I <WG3165> ought <WG1163> <WG5713> to rejoice <WG5463> <WG5721>; having confidence <WG3982> <WG5756> in <WG1909> you <WG5209> all <WG3956>, that <WG3754> my <WG1699> joy <WG5479> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the joy of you <WG5216> all <WG3956>.

For <WG1063> out of <WG1537> much <WG4183> affliction <WG2347> and <WG2532> anguish <WG4928> of heart <WG2588> I wrote <WG1125> <WG5656> unto you <WG5213> with <WG1223> many <WG4183> tears <WG1144>; not <WG3756> that <WG2443> ye should be grieved <WG3076> <WG5686>, but <WG235> that <WG2443> ye might know <WG1097> <WG5632> the love <WG26> which <WG3739> I have <WG2192> <WG5719> more abundantly <WG4056> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>.

But <WG1161> if any <WG1536> have caused grief <WG3076> <WG5758>, he hath <WG3076> not <WG3756> grieved <WG3076> <WG5758> me <WG1691>, but <WG235> in <WG575> part <WG3313>: that <WG3363> I may <WG1912> not <WG3363> overcharge <WG1912> <WG5725> you <WG5209> all <WG3956>.
Sufficient <WG2425> to such a man <WG5108> is this <WG3778> punishment <WG2009>, which <WG3588> was inflicted of <WG5259> many <WG4119>.

So <WG5620> that contrariwise <WG5121> ye <WG5209> ought rather <WG3123> to forgive <WG5483> <WG5664> him, and <WG2532> comfort <WG3870> <WG5658> him, lest <WG3381> perhaps <WG4458> such a one <WG5108> should be swallowed up <WG2666> <WG5686> with overmuch <WG4055> sorrow <WG3077>.
Wherefore <WG1352> I beseech <WG3870> <WG5719> you <WG5209> that ye would confirm <WG2964> <WG5658> your love <WG26> toward <WG1519> him <WG846>.

For <WG1063> to <WG1519> this end <WG5124> also <WG2532> did I write <WG1125> <WG5656>, that <WG2443> I might know <WG1097> <WG5632> the proof <WG1382> of you <WG5216>, whether <WG1487> ye be <WG2075> <WG5748> `Ovedient <WG5255> in <WG1519> all things <WG3956>.

<WG1161> To whom <WG3739> ye forgive <WG5483> <WG5736> any thing <WG5100>, I <WG1473> forgive also <WG2532>: for <WG2532> <WG1063> if I <WG1473> forgave <WG5483> <WG5766> any thing <WG1536>, to whom <WG3739> I forgave <WG5483> <WG5766> it, for your sakes <WG1223> <WG5209> forgave I it in <WG1722> the person <WG4383> of Moshiach <WG5547>;
Lest <WG3363> Satan <WG5259> <WG4567> should get an advantage of us <WG4122> <WG5686>: for <WG1063> we are not <WG3756> ignorant <WG50> <WG5719> of his <WG846> devices <WG3540>.

Furthermore <WG1161>, when I came <WG2064> <WG5631> to <WG1519> Troas <WG5174> to <WG1519> preach Moshiach's <WG5547> gospel <WG2098>, and <WG2532> a door <WG2374> was opened <WG455> <WG5772> unto me <WG3427> of <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>,

I had <WG2192> <WG5758> no <WG3756> rest <WG425> in my <WG3450> spirit <WG4151>, because I <WG3165> found <WG2147> <WG5629> not <WG3361> Titus <WG5103> my <WG3450> brother <WG80>: but <WG235> taking my leave <WG657> <WG5671> of them <WG846>, I went from thence <WG1831> <WG5627> into <WG1519> Macedonia <WG3109>.

Now <WG1161> thanks <WG5485> be unto 'Elohim <WG2316>, which always <WG3842> causeht <WG2358> us <WG2248> to triumph <WG2358> <WG5723> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>, and <WG2532> maketh manifest <WG5319> <WG5723> the savour <WG3744> of his <WG846> knowledge <WG1108> by <WG1223> us <WG2257> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> place <WG5117>.

For <WG3754> we are <WG2070> <WG5748> unto 'Elohim <WG2316> a sweet savour <WG2175> of Moshiach <WG5547>, in <WG1722> them that are saved <WG4982> <WG5746>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> them that perish <WG622> <WG5730>:

To <WG3739> the one <WG3303> we are the savour <WG3744> of death <WG2288> unto <WG1519> death <WG2288>; and <WG1161> to the other <WG3739> the savour <WG3744> of life <WG2222> unto <WG1519> life <WG2222>. And <WG2532> who <WG5101> is sufficient <WG2425> for <WG4314> these things <WG5023>?

For <WG1063> we are <WG2070> <WG5748> not <WG3756> as <WG5613> many <WG4183>, which corrupt <WG2585> <WG5723> the word <WG3056> of 'Elohim <WG2316>: but <WG235> as <WG5613> of <WG1537> sincerity <WG1505>, but <WG235> as <WG5613> of <WG1537> 'Elohim <WG2316>, in the sight <WG2714> of 'Elohim <WG2316> speak we <WG2980> <WG5719> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>.
